title: Vaadi EnTamilselvi Lyrics Remo Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Vaadi EnTamilselvi Song Lyrics  With English Meaning
Music:Anirudh | Lyrics:Vignesh Shivan
Singer:Nakash Aziz

Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Vaadi EnTamilselvi
I'll take you shopping
to the nalli.
ne pogathadi
thalli thalli
theriyaadhaa
maaman gilli

Vaadi EnTamilselvi
I'll take you shopping
to the nalli.
ne  pogadhadi
thalli thalli
theriyaadhaa..

Once side-ah love
pannithaan
boru adikkudhadi.

double side-ye
love pannathaan
romba naalaa ready

half rate-ula
vandi vaangi
unaku ooru suththi
kaattatummaa

full aagaatha
thaetreula
en kadhala ottattumaa

Vaadi EnTamilselvi
I'll take you shopping
to the nalli.
ne pogadhadi
thalli thalli
theriyaadhaa
maaman gilli (2)

Sambala covera
thorakka maatteney
adha mulusa
tharuveney.

ambalaikku azhagaa
vela seyyum
gappula, call panni
naan konjuveney

unna petha
En atha maamana
dhinam poosa
pannuveney

marana mokka
neengellaam
pottaalum naan
vaai vittu
sirippene.

oruvaatti ok
solli paaru
usura thaan
naan ezhudhi
thaaren.

madangaadha neeyum
adangaadha naanum
manasodu manasu
sync aanaa podhum

to the nalli.
nee pogadhadi
thalli thalli
vaai is valiching
solli solli

Vaadi EnTamilselvi

to the nalli.
ad poyendi ne
ok solli..		English Meaning
I tried my best :)
Come here Tamil girl
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop
You don’t move
away From me
Don’t you know
about me

Come here Tamil girl
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop
You don’t move
away From me
Don’t you know ..

It’s boring
to have a
one side love

I’m always
ready for
two side love

Shall I take
you around
the city with
half rate bike fair

Shall I run
my love movie
in empty theatre

Come here Tamil girl
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop.
You don’t move
away From me.
Don’t you know
about me.

I will not open
my salary cover
and give it to
You first.

I’ll behave like
a man and
prattle you
in breaks.

I’ll do pooja
to my uncle and aunty
who gave
birth to you

I’ll laugh out
loud even
If you guys
Make bad
Jokes

Tell “OK”
Once to me
I’ll write
My life
For you.

A strong girl like you
An unruly man like me
Just enough if our
mind sync together

Come here Tamil daily
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop.
Don’t go away
from me.
My mouth pains
on keep saying it.

Come here Tamil daily
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop
Don’t go away
from me
Don’t you know

Come here Tamil daily
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop
Don’t go away
from me
Don’t you know
About me

Come here Tamil daily
I'll take you shopping
to the Nalli Shop
can’t you
Just say “ok”
